attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to own a legally registerd handgun was taken away from respectable citizens in a knee jerk reaction after Dunblane.Anyone who has an interest in guns as a sport or as an example of fine engeneering or indeed an interest in historical warfare should be able to obtain replica firearms to study and enjoy.People who like guns should not automatically be classed as criminals

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
